title: This Is Why We Can't Have Nice Things
lyrics: It was so nice throwing big parties<BREAKER>Jump into the pool from the balcony<BREAKER>Everyone swimming in a champagne sea<BREAKER>And there are no rules when you show up here<BREAKER>Bass beat rattling the chandelier<BREAKER>Feeling so Gatsby for that whole year
So why'd you have to rain on my parade?<BREAKER>I'm shaking my head, I'm locking the gates

This is why we can't have nice things, darling<BREAKER>Because you break them, I had to take them away<BREAKER>This is why we can't have nice things, honey (oh)<BREAKER>Did you think I wouldn't hear all the things you said about me?<BREAKER>This is why we can't have nice things

But I'm not the only friend you've lost lately (mmm-mmm)<BREAKER>If only you weren't so shady
